pull.title: build, qt: Ditch `no_sdk_version_check.patch`
pull.body: Since Qt 5.12.2 (see https://github.com/qt/qtbase/commit/5d181961ea28da07128384aa5144c67d07f87a3e) it is possible to control whether to check macOS SDK with the `QT_MAC_SDK_NO_VERSION_CHECK` variable.

verification.payload:
tree e449cccb0071ed4acd1564bd32e6f6726095ed18
parent 4f8b1f8759301d2553183e14f72444a0f1d80725
author Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1638125814 +0200
committer Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1638125814 +0200

build, qt: Ditch `no_sdk_version_check.patch`

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

issue.title: build: Fix `make apk` for Android w/ non-default SOURCES_PATH in depends
issue.body:
On master (1488f55fa57a1400a57be837b574183f019c7855) if depends are built with the customized `SOURCES_PATH` variable, the following `make apk` fails for Android host (see bitcoin/bitcoin#22522).

Fixes bitcoin/bitcoin#22522.

issue.title: build: Improve depends build system robustness
issue.body:
The depends build system looks fragile in its current state. For example, on master (346e780442f91fc155dcc9c44eedf23ac0bb15a7):
```
$ make --no-print-directory -C depends print-qt_suffix
qt_suffix=everywhere-opensource-src-4.3.4.tar.xz
```

With this PR:
```
$ make --no-print-directory -C depends print-qt_suffix
qt_suffix=everywhere-opensource-src-5.15.3.tar.xz
```

Required for bitcoin/bitcoin#22555.

issue.title: build: Qt 5.15.2
issue.body:
> Opening this for visibility. Apart from it probably being time to use a newer version of Qt for releases, an update is required so that we are using a version which has a C++17 mode.
> 
> The biggest change here is that [Qt no longer has internal xcb libs](https://codereview.qt.nokia.com/c/qt/qtbase/+/253905), so we need to build the requirements ourselves.


Ref: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19716
Ref: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23489

- build, qt: Ditch no_sdk_version_check.patch
Ref: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23618

- build: Post-pr23489 small cleanups
Ref: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23675

- build, qt, macOS: Don't hard-code x86_64 as the arch when using qmake 
Ref: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23583

issue.title: build: Qt 5.15.2
issue.body:
Cherrypicking because I broke the last one. Sorry.

> Opening this for visibility. Apart from it probably being time to use a newer version of Qt for releases, an update is required so that we are using a version which has a C++17 mode.
> 
> The biggest change here is that [Qt no longer has internal xcb libs](https://codereview.qt.nokia.com/c/qt/qtbase/+/253905), so we need to build the requirements ourselves.


Ref: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19716
Ref: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23489

- build, qt: Ditch no_sdk_version_check.patch
Ref: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23618

- build: Post-pr23489 small cleanups
Ref: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23675

- build, qt, macOS: Don't hard-code x86_64 as the arch when using qmake 
Ref: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23583
